quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
name: St. Jerome

quote: A good beginning makes a good end.

name: Dalai Lama

quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.

quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.

quote: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.

quote: Death and love are the two wings that bear the good man to heaven.

quote: Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
name: Aristotle

name: Thomas Aquinas

name: Samuel Butler

name: Euripides

quote: It is always the best policy to speak the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.

name: Thomas Aquinas

name: Hugh Hefner

quote: Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.
name: Agatha Christie

quote: A woman is only a woman, but a good cigar is a smoke.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified, and God will be in them.
name: Swami Vivekananda

name: Quintilian

name: Sophocles

quote: The power of choosing good and evil is within the reach of all.

name: Francis Bacon

name: Khloe Kardashian

quote: All music is escapism for me, but I like the way that, on a good night, that sense of escapism can be shared.
name: Jamie xx

quote: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.

quote: I've had long hair, I've had short hair, and I've had in between hair... and its all good.

quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
name: Josh Billings

quote: I'm La Flame at all times. That, at times, can be bad, at times can be good.
name: Travis Scott

quote: If you can't make it good, at least make it look good.

name: Alistair Brownlee

quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: When I'm good, I'm very good. But when I'm bad I'm better.
name: Mae West

quote: God is everywhere but He is most manifest in man. So serve man as God. That is as good as worshipping God.
name: Ramakrishna

name: Richard Whately

quote: People's character is their behaviour - we're all capable of good and evil.

name: Rachel McAdams

name: Patti Smith

quote: I can live for two months on a good compliment.
name: Mark Twain

quote: People change over the years, and that changes situations for good and for bad.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: And I believe that good journalism, good television, can make our world a better place.
name: Christiane Amanpour

name: Plato

name: Sofia Richie

name: Michael Seibel

name: Jane Austen

quote: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
name: Horace

quote: A good photograph is knowing where to stand.

name: Mary Docter

name: John Derek

name: Amy Grant

quote: My goal is to stay in good health, and every day, I wake up and pray that I do.

name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Be not simply good - be good for something.
name: Henry David Thoreau

name: St. Jerome

quote: I just love hanging out with good company on a great, fun golf course.

name: James Dashner

name: Tom Brady

name: Voltaire

name: Dr. Seuss

name: Kate Moss

quote: The 'good old times' - all times when old are good.

name: Emma Bunton

quote: I don't want to be interesting. I want to be good.

quote: Good things do not come easy. The road is lined with pitfalls.

quote: Show me a good loser, and I'll show you a loser.

name: Henry David Thoreau

name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The good old days are now.
name: Tom Clancy

quote: What the people want is very simple - they want an America as good as its promise.

quote: Good thoughts bear good fruit, bad thoughts bear bad fruit.

quote: The omission of good is no less reprehensible than the commission of evil.

name: Francis Bacon

quote: It is the mark of a good action that it appears inevitable in retrospect.

quote: What a miserable thing life is: you're living in clover, only the clover isn't good enough.

name: Horace Mann

name: Oliver Herford

name: Jean Paul

quote: If it were better, it wouldn't be as good.
name: Brendan Gill

quote: Free is the best. Anything free is good.
name: Sandra Bullock

name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: No one can be good for long if goodness is not in demand.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: No news at 4:30 a.m. is good.
name: Lady Bird Johnson

quote: I don't think I am any good. If I thought I was any good, I wouldn't be.
name: John Betjeman

quote: He who bestows his goods upon the poor shall have as much again, and ten times more.
name: John Bunyan

quote: The more one has seen of the good, the more one asks for the better.
name: John Mason Brown

quote: Have a very good reason for everything you do.
name: Laurence Olivier

quote: I'd rather be lucky than good.
name: Lefty Gomez

quote: What is beautiful is good, and who is good will soon be beautiful.
